Each worker is to use his God-given ability to the utmost for the uplifting of Christ's kingdom on earth. We each have an individuality in manner and bearing, and this is as it should be; but this need not prevent 


                                    -394- 

our working together in perfect harmony. . . . You may have diverse temperaments, and yet be laborers together with God, all working in harmony, and when all your ability is put into the work, you will accomplish the best results. . . . The Lord's resources are unlimited; we are only instruments in His hands, and great things can be accomplished through His name. . . .
